website_summaries.verdict: If you need a diaper rash formula for active rashes, it's a good choice, though the price is high.
pros: Contains vitamin B derivative and chamomile for healing and glycerin for moisturizing
Quickly begins to heal rash and irritation
cons: Pricey, and you only get 7 oz
a jar might be more convenient

customer_reviews.title: Good but tiny.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the diaper bag or to give as a gift. I use this product from the big container at home and love it. These little ones are really tiny though especially for the price. It might be better to just buy the huge tub and then put it into tiny containers by yourself. The picture shows the size compared to my hand and pacifier.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Baby formula is same as regular product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with aquaphor and keep them everywhere to make sure I always have a tube when needed. I was running low and decided to order more when I found a good deal on this "baby" version. I wasn't sure if there'd be a difference between this variety and my usual kind, but the price was good so I decided to try it. I'm happy to report that the two products are seemingly identical and now I'm restocked with my favorite lip treatment.
customer_reviews.author: seeJsave

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it AND it works!
customer_reviews.text: My little one had chapped skin and a rash around her mouth and on her cheeks and the Pediatrician recommended this product. I thought it was a little pricey, so I bought the little tubes. Well, this stuff will last forever because you don't have to use very much to get good coverage. Plus, it smells good (neutral) and is a silky texture that the baby seems to enjoy. She leaves it alone and even lets me put it on without a struggle. After a week of use, the rash is starting to clear up and the redness is completely gone!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G

customer_reviews.title: Amazon keeps mislabeling this product!
customer_reviews.text: This has less to do with the product and more to do with Amazon. I ordered this, but received the regular (not baby) version. Thinking it was a fluke, I ordered it again and the same mistake was made. When I wished to exchange it for the correct item and pointed out they had accidentally put “baby” barcodes on the regular version, they sent ANOTHER mislabeled regular version. I now have 3 boxes of regular Aquaphor...it’s fine for me, but I’m a bit peeved that they didn’t read the reason for the return. Aquaphor Baby is amazing! I highly recommend the product if you can actually get it.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: We were using a steroid cream recommended by her doctor
customer_reviews.text: We use this ointment for my daughter's chapped lips and chin during teething episodes and during the winter. We apply it when needed before she goes to sleep and her chapped skin/lips are healed overnight. We were using a steroid cream recommended by her doctor, but I was hesitant to use a steroid so often, so I switched to this - and it works better. A little greasy, which is why we use it at night. But effective for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MaggieRhea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go size!!
customer_reviews.text: I mean what's not to say!!! We use this every time we change his diaper to prevent diaper rash. However there are so many more ways to use it. It keeps his skin soft and moisturized and it helped rod the super dryness on his face following a bout with baby acne. It cleared it up. It's a staple in our home and these small on the go tubes are perfect for the car, diaper bag and multiple changing stations in your home.
customer_reviews.author: June Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Your safety, go fast, deliver fast, and GO. Is called SAFETY!
customer_reviews.text: I love all three of my items, Thanks for on time delivery, And sometimes, it would HELP, IF YOU CALLED THE FRONT DESK BEFORE YOUR ON YOUR WAY, IT'S THAT THINGS IN THIS WORLD, ARE CHANGING, AND SO WE HAVE TO CHANGE WITH THEM, AND TO MAKE YOU NOT HAVE TO WAIT,. I DON'T LIKE YOU WAITING WAITING!! EITHER. CALL FIRST, SO YOU CAN COME FAST AND LEAVE FAST! BECAUSE OF WHAT'S HAPPEN IN THIS WORLD TODAY, AND I BELIEVE SAFFETY AND Common SENSE, is better to use Stay safe and out of harms way... Thank you, Anna LaSonya McGee
customer_reviews.author: Anna McGee

customer_reviews.title: Diaper-rash gone in hours! Really!
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my son's little behind! It's only the second product to use to combat diaper rash (Hello Bello cream was first: no relief for my son), but after using this, I noticed a significant difference by the next few diapers. By the time a couple hours had gone by, so had the rash! LOVE this stuff. It spreads nicely on his soft skin. I have the large size for diaper changes at home, and the travel size for the diaper bag. It also alleviated the dry skin on my son's feet. BUY THIS PRODUCT!! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica from FL.

customer_reviews.title: Lipbalm size
customer_reviews.text: Aquaphor can be a total lifesaver but, you're better off spending a dollar extra and gettimg a 3 oz tube. It is a small amount that you are getting. This is more the size of a chapstick, great at moisturizing and helping any rashes that your little may have but not a great valie for your money, get the 3 oz tube for traveling, 9 oz tube for home.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are convenient but are more much expensive than a standard 1.7 ounce tube which is still small enough to be put in a diaper bag or taken on an airplane carry on. Only necessary if you need a very small amount or the ability to stick this in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tubes.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this item to be as SMALL as it is I wish I could include a picture. Maybe I didn’t read the description very well but definitely thought it would be bigger. Shipping was perfect though! And product will work however I will have to give in and buy the bigger tube.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: What the heck!!??
customer_reviews.text: Ok this thing is the size of a lip palm no lie!! For the price you can get you a bigger size at Walmart! 🤦🏻‍♀️🤦🏻‍♀️ Which was the size I thght. it would be closer to. Save your money and buy you a bigger size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Aquaphor ointment for easy access on the go, and the sizing is ideal for this purpose. It is a great fight against eczema, and is also great on the hands in the winter months. I live in New York, so the winter here is very brutal and cold! I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product, and would definitely repurchase. Great pricing, works great, easy to travel with, and definitely a winter essential. A little amount goes a very long way, so this is a great value for the money. Don't look further for a great travel size version of aquaphor!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best chapped and peeling lips remedy!
customer_reviews.text: My lips were chapped for weeks and were peeling like crazy. I tried many different lip remedies but this was the best! They healed immediately after using for a day or 2. Perfect size for my purse and an extra for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pack

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I love this healing ointment. I use it for everything from cradle cap on my daughter to sore nose from a cold to a rash under her neck and it heals it all in less than a day. Buy it buy it. I tell everyone I know about it. You can even put it on a tattoo.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for away from home!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tubes to tuck away anywhere when traveling. The same thing as in the big jar. I am very pleased with my purchase. I highly recommended for young and old. Thin and heavy. Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle worker. My daughter had some pretty bad diaper rash we tried two different ointments/pasted before aquafor one included desitin and those did nothing for her. Aquafor cleared it up just within a few days. Super easy to apply, it’s like Vaseline. I will ONLY buy aquafor from now on. It really helped my baby and put my mind at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Baby soft lips
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ointment! I use it as lip balm and keeps my lips soft all day long. I’m not a baby, but I treat my lips as my baby so works out right? Also, ingredients seem the same as the original one and this is cheaper
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Works within hours
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Has worked great on my son’s drool rashed chin, dry skin around his nose, and even mom’s chapped lips when I can’t seem to find my chapstick lol. Have a big jar & the travel tube.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids dry lips, face, hands! I’ve tried it all!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for any dry, winter skin on little ones. I sneak it on my toddlers lips in the middle of the night. Way more effective than Vaseline & a little goes a long way! This product is also wonderful for dry, cracked hands. I will be buying this again & recommending to all my mom friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got 2 toddlers, we use this stuff all the time. I love these small tubes, always keep one in my purse and diaper bag. Works great on lips I’m winter, irritated bottoms etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These small tubes are great for travel and great for dry skin. I use this lotion for my tattoos and it seems to work great! I love the small tubes that don’t take up much room and they last a long time! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kester

customer_reviews.title: Beats carrying a Tub of Aquaphor lol
customer_reviews.text: I love these little tubes!! The diaper bag has gotten ten times lighter. Beats carrying the big Tub of aquaphor around I’ll tell u that much!!! Would definitely recommend if you strolling around with the big Tun in Ur diaper bag!! This is a must have!!
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the diaper bag and to use solely on my baby's face. He gets eczema patches from all his slobber so these are great for daily application and to differentiate between diaper rash tubes and face tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Marlina

customer_reviews.title: We use aquaphor on everything
customer_reviews.text: Great for throwing in a purse or on the go bag for baby. I use it on myself as well, as I think aquaphor is good for all things skin related. Great for chapped lips and noses!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I like to keep a small “necessities” pouch of med like things in my baby’s diaper bag. Aquaphor is my favorite, so just had for purchase when I saw these

customer_reviews.title: FYI these are trial size
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but these tubes are just trial size FYI

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I went on accutane years ago and the inside of my nose is forever dry. I don’t leave home without one of these. They’re a bit pricey, but what else am I going to do? They’re convenient
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have much hope going in as the best results I've gotten was a slightly softer dry spot
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this cream. I've had dry spots on my arms forever and through the years have tried multiple lotions and creams with no luck. Not only have the dried spots cleared up, but in general my arms have become smoother and softer. I didn't have much hope going in as the best results I've gotten was a slightly softer dry spot, but it's gone and no sign of coming back. I wish there were 6stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kay E. Glandon

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient size. A little pricey considering you can get a big tube for this but they know it is worth it because of the convenience.

customer_reviews.title: Handy for on the go

customer_reviews.title: This is the best ointment!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many different ointments to cure my son's diaper rashes. I have also tried to clean his bottom with water, adjust my eating habit etc but none works until I tried Aquaphor. This is the best ointment!!

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips
customer_reviews.text: Love Aquaphor products, I use this for my lips in the dry winters and it works wonders. My lips stay moist and soft.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling and for diaper bags!
customer_reviews.text: We love aquaphor for our baby and love these little tubes to carry in the diaper bag! If you use aquaphor at home, you need these for the diaper bag!

customer_reviews.title: love the product, but not the quantity.
customer_reviews.text: i love aquaphor baby. it has many uses, but i should have read the label more clearly as these tubes are TINY! i keep the big tub at home and wanted something smaller for travel, but these were a lot smaller than i expected. they barely lasted for a weeklong trip. i guess that is my mistake - next time i will buy the 3 oz size for travel.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my twins when they have chapped lips or dry areas. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff so much more than the diaper creams. It works well and it cleans off well.

customer_reviews.title: Works for babies dry scalp
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my babies dry scalp. Nothing seemed to help but this product. It doesn’t make it too oily looking either.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: his skin looked way better and completely gone after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my son's baby acne. Dr suggested to leave alone and only use water to clean but after a while, my son's got rough and looked chapped. So I used the aquaphor and after one use, his skin looked way better and completely gone after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy AN

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my daughter to prevent and clear diaper rash. I use it to prevent and clear chafing from running. On my dry legs and face in the winter. It is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Code Alpha

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I love using Aquaphor for my child's diaper rashes. It's the only thing that works since she's allergic to zinc oxide creams. It really does get rid of the rashes quickly. If I apply this to her at night, the next morning her diaper rash is gone. I recommend this cream to almost everyone that asks me about diaper rashes. I love the small convenient tubes. Great for in the purse or diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey M.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle ointment
customer_reviews.text: Aquaphor is like miracle ointment. It can literally be used for anything - diaper rash, chapped skin, as a skin barrier for drooling babies, to help with baby acne... You name it, Aquaphor is probably the solution. We have a full sized container at home and keep a travel sized one in the diaper bag and leave another one at grandmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K.

customer_reviews.title: I can use the others like chapstick because they always give me an unflattering series ...
customer_reviews.text: My go to lip moisturizer. I can use the others like chapstick because they always give me an unflattering series of pimples on my lips- elk. This is perfect and fits in any purse

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny size!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tiny tubes! I usually buy larger size, but noticed that having these tiny ones everywhere is super convenient and you don’t need to worry about not using all since they are so small you will use it all! ;)

customer_reviews.title: We love Aquaphor. It is like a convenient petroleum jelly ...
customer_reviews.text: We love Aquaphor. It is like a convenient petroleum jelly or Vaseline. Works better than normal chap sticks that dry out your lips, causing you to need more chap stick and having to buy more. This is thinner and easy to spread. It actually moisturizes and helps keep lips smooth and not cracked or dry.

product_meta.title: Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment To-Go Pack - Advanced Therapy for Chapped Cheeks and Diaper Rash - Two .35 oz. Tubes
product_meta.description: Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment is designed specifically to suit the sensitive skin of babies. This is the number 1 pediatrician recommended multi-purpose solution for your baby's many skincare needs. Ideal for relieving diaper rash, this healing baby ointment is also great for soothing dry, chapped or cracked skin and helps prevent chafing. It nourishes and protects baby's skin to enhance healing from skin irritations such as chapped skin from teething and drool rash. Uniquely formulated with 41% Petrolatum to allow oxygen to flow. Moms can also use the ointment to soften dry hands and cuticles, cracked heels or chapped lips. To use: Apply Ointment with every diaper change to protect the skin from wetness, acidity and chafing. Also use for diaper rash, drool rash, minor scrapes and scratches, as well as dry chafed skin. If the diaper area does get irritated, use soothing Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Cream for mild to moderate diaper rash and fast relief Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Paste for more troublesome rashes. Aquaphor Baby Ointment is a white translucent to light yellow ointment. Color variations occur due to the nature of the ingredients in the product, but do not affect product safety and performance.
feature_bullets: Multi-purpose solution for your baby's many skin care needs, Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment is clinically proven to restore smooth, healthy skin
Provide extra gentle care for your baby’s tender and delicate skin by applying Aquaphor to irritated and chapped skin from teething, drool rash and more
Use Aquaphor Ointment as a preventative diaper rash cream and apply with every diaper change to protect the skin from wetness, acidity and chafing to help avoid rashes
Preservative and fragrance free, specifically to suit the sensitive skin of babies
Perfect for on the go! - Two(2) .35 oz tubes

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
